scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build-client: SET NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --display-modules --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-server: SET NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.start: npm run clean & SET NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development babel-node src/server
scripts.start-analyzer: npm run clean && SET NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development ANALYZER=true babel-node src/server
scripts.start-production: npm run build && SET NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production babel-node src/server
